message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
I'm being generous, but I think I deserve more
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fair compromise
I'm not leaving with less than a million
You're being greedy, Bob! I'm willing to give you a small share, but not that small
I'll take a small share, but I'm not going to let you have all the money!
Come on, Bob, be reasonable! I'm willing to give you a tiny share, but I need most of the money
I'm not leaving with less than 99.995% of the money!
Bob, you're being ridiculous. I'm willing to give you a tiny share, but I'm not going to let you take almost all the money
I'll take almost all the money, but I'll let you have a dollar
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not negotiating further
I'm taking it all, Alice. You should have accepted my previous offers!
This is my final, final offer, Bob. Take the dollar and leave. I'm not negotiating further
Fine, I'll take a 50/50 split. Let's just end this already.
